alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 3:18PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Essex and northeastern Middlesex Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chelmsford, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Lawrence, Haverhill, Methuen, Billerica, Chelmsford, Andover, Dracut, Tewksbury, North Andover, Westford, Tyngsborough, Georgetown, Boxford, Groveland, Rowley, Carlisle and West Newbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Avoid flooded road ways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Massachusetts.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Western Essex
